functions.title: NodeInfo
functions.name: nodeinfo
functions.description: Get info about the machine that you're deployed on. Tells CPU count, hostname, OS, and Uptime

functions.title: alpine
functions.name: alpine
functions.description: An Alpine Linux shell, set the "fprocess" to a bash built-in you want to run like "env" or "cal". By default alpine runs "cat" and can be used to echo the HTTP input.

functions.title: env
functions.name: env
functions.description: Print the environment variables present in the function and HTTP request

functions.title: sleep
functions.name: sleep
functions.description: Simulate a 2s duration or pass an X-Sleep header and a valid Golang duration

functions.title: shasum
functions.name: shasum
functions.description: Generate a shasum for the given input

functions.title: Figlet
functions.name: figlet
functions.description: Generate ASCII logos with the figlet CLI

functions.title: curl
functions.name: curl
functions.description: Use curl for network diagnostics, pass the full command-line to the function

functions.title: SentimentAnalysis
functions.description: Python function provides a rating on sentiment positive/negative (polarity -1.0-1.0) and subjectivity to provided to each of the sentences sent.
functions.name: sentimentanalysis

functions.title: hey
functions.name: hey
functions.description: HTTP load generator, ApacheBench (ab) replacement

functions.title: nslookup
functions.description: Query the nameserver for the IP address of the given HOST optionally using a specified DNS server
functions.name: nslookup

functions.title: SSL/TLS cert info
functions.name: certinfo
functions.description: Returns SSL/TLS certificate information for a given URL

functions.title: Colorization
functions.name: colorise
functions.description: Turn black and white photos to color using a URL as the request. The colorization function was popularised by @colorisebot by Alex Ellis and Finnian Anderson.

functions.title: Inception
functions.name: inception
functions.description: This is a forked version of the work by Magnus Erik Hvass Pedersen - it has been re-packaged as an OpenFaaS serverless function.

functions.title: Have I Been Pwned
functions.description: The Have I Been Pwned function lets you know if your password has been used in a data-breach published on https://haveibeenpwned.com
functions.name: haveibeenpwned

functions.title: Face Detection with Pigo
functions.description: Detect faces in images using the Pigo face detection library. You provide an image URI and the function draws boxes around the detected faces.
functions.name: face-detect-pigo

functions.title: Tesseract OCR
functions.description: This function brings OCR - Optical Character Recognition through the tesseract engine. Just pass in a URL or base64 string of an image in .jpg or .png format.
functions.name: ocr

functions.title: Dockerhub Stats
functions.description: Golang function gives the count of repos a user has on the Docker hub
functions.name: hubstats

functions.title: QR Code Generator - Go
functions.description: QR Code generator using Go
functions.name: qrcode-go

functions.title: Nmap Security Scanner
functions.description: Tool for network discovery and security auditing. Warning: use with caution on public clouds.
functions.name: nmap

functions.title: ASCII Cows
functions.description: Generate a random ASCII cow
functions.name: cows

functions.title: YouTube Video Downloader
functions.description: Download YouTube videos as a function
functions.name: youtube-dl

functions.title: OpenFaaS Text-to-Speech
functions.description: Generate an MP3 of text using Google's Text-to-Speech
functions.name: text-to-speech

functions.title: Docker Image Manifest Query
functions.description: Query an image on the Docker Hub for supported architectures - by Phil Estes
functions.name: mquery

functions.title: face-detect with OpenCV
functions.description: Detect faces in images. Send a URL as input and download a file with boxes drawn around detected faces. From our friend Nic Jackson
functions.name: face-detect-opencv

functions.title: Face blur by Endre Simo
functions.description: Blur out faces detected in JPEGs. Invoke with the URL to the image.
functions.name: face-blur

functions.title: Left-Pad
functions.description: left-pad on OpenFaaS
functions.name: leftpad

functions.title: normalisecolor
functions.description: Automatically fix white-balance in photos through imagemagick.
functions.name: normalisecolor

functions.title: mememachine
functions.description: Turn any image into a meme.
functions.name: mememachine

functions.title: Business Strategy Generator
functions.description: Generates a Business Strategy (using a package from Nisha Kumar, inspired by Simon Wardley)
functions.name: business-strategy-generator

functions.title: Line Drawing Generator from a photograph
functions.description: Automatically generates a sketch like image art based on the provided image
functions.name: coherent-line-drawing

functions.title: Image EXIF Reader
functions.description: Reads EXIF information from an URL or base64 encoded image and returns JSON
functions.name: openfaas-exif

functions.title: Open NSFW Model
functions.description: Score images for NSFW (nudity) content.
functions.name: openfaas-opennsfw

functions.title: Identicon Generator
functions.description: Create an identicon from a provided string value
functions.name: identicon
